movies.title: Su-ki-da
movies.plot: A high school student named Yu has a crush on one of her classmates, Yosuke. The boy spends most of his time sitting outside and playing his guitar, and Yu sits nearby and listens. One day, however, a terrible tragedy occurs, and the two do not see each other again for many years.
movies.simplePlot: A high school student named Yu has a crush on one of her classmates, Yosuke. The boy spends most of his time sitting outside and playing his guitar, and Yu sits nearby and listens. One day,...

biography.bio: Aoi Miyazaki was born on November 30, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), The Great Passage (2013) and Eureka (2000). She was previously married to Sôsuke Takaoka.
biography.name: Aoi Miyazaki

biography.bio: Hidetoshi Nishijima was born on March 29, 1971 in Hachioji, Japan. He is an actor, known for Le vent se lève (2013), Dolls (2002) and Tony Takitani (2004).
biography.name: Hidetoshi Nishijima

biography.bio: Hiromi Nagasaku was born on October 14, 1970 in Ibaraki, Japan. She is an actress, known for Rebirth (2011), Saihate nite (2014) and Funuke Show Some Love, You Losers! (2007). She has been married to Maro Naitô since April 27, 2009. They have one child.
biography.name: Hiromi Nagasaku

biography.bio: Eita was born on December 13, 1982 as Eita Nagayama. He is an actor, known for Memories of Matsuko (2006), Dear Doctor (2009) and Azumi (2003). He has been married to Kaela Kimura since September 1, 2010. They have one child.
biography.name: Eita

biography.bio: Ryo Kase was born on November 9, 1974 in Yokohama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Letters from Iwo Jima (2006), I Just Didn't Do It (2006) and Tokyo! (2008).
biography.name: Ryo Kase

biography.bio: Maho Nonami was born on June 13, 1980 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for 2LDK (2003), Ai o kou hito (1998) and Scarecrow (2001). She has been married to Kensei Mikami since December 9, 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Maho Nonami

biography.bio: Nao Ohmori was born on February 19, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ichi the Killer (2001), From Up on Poppy Hill (2011) and Vibrator (2003).
biography.name: Nao Ohmori

biography.bio: Sayuri Oyamada was born in 1975 in Niigata, Japan. She is an actress, known for Body Drop Asphalt (2000), Von (2011) and While the Women Are Sleeping (2016).
biography.name: Sayuri Oyamada

biography.bio: Isao Yoshida is a composer and actor, known for Watashi no uchi niwa, nannimo nai (2016) and Su-ki-da (2005).
biography.name: Isao Yoshida
